item.title: Creating Fractals
item.description: Fractals show the beauty of numbers. There are many famous fractals, which are often named after European mathematicians. You may have heard of Sierpinski’s Triangle, the Mandelbrot Set, and the Koch Curve. These are all fractal patterns.
